scripts.name: Fix Broken Links
scripts.description: Fixes broken Sharepoint links that point to another user's home folder on Mac or Windows.

scripts.name: Badger to Email
scripts.description: Takes the feature view exported from Badger and turns it into email product blocks.

scripts.name: Create Store Signs
scripts.description: Exports each group as an 8.5 x 11 PDF.

scripts.name: Generate Alt Tags
scripts.description: Takes the feature view exported from Badger and turns it into email product blocks.

scripts.name: Convert Foot & Inch Marks
scripts.description: Converts double quotes to inch marks and single quotes to foot mark characters.

scripts.name: Proper Fractions
scripts.description: Just select a fraction, like 1/8, run the automation and you get a properly styled fraction.

scripts.name: Create Smartly Ads
scripts.description: Creates ads formatted for Smartly and sorts them into folders by DC.

scripts.name: Group Product Blocks
scripts.description: Anything inside a product block (white rectangle) will be grouped. To ensure this works properly, first check that elements are not hanging off the edge of the block too much.

scripts.name: Export Groups
scripts.description: Automatically exports groups as JPEGs into a folder named 'images'. The filename is determined by the text inside each group.

scripts.name: Apply Discounts
scripts.description: Select a discount to apply, and click ok. Note: this only works with prices with a paragraph style named 'our price'. For line lists, the applied paragraph style name must contain 'line list'.

scripts.name: Remove Styles
scripts.description: Run to remove all object, paragraph and cell styles in the current document.

scripts.name: Fit to Frame
scripts.description: Select a text or image frame and run to fit within the frame bounds.

scripts.name: Reset Image Transformations
scripts.description: Select one or multiple images. The script will clear transformations such as rotation and flip, then fit them to the frame.

scripts.name: Calculate Savings
scripts.description: Select multiple product blocks and run to get the highest savings percentage.
